subject: Biology
question_text: The functions of the body are coordinated by nerve impulses and hormones.
subtopic: Coordination and Response (Nervous and Endocrine Systems)

difficulty.justification: Requires comparison of nervous and hormonal coordination and application to a specific physiological response (fight-or-flight).

sub_questions.text: Compare these two types of coordination.

A girl sees a vehicle travelling towards her at speed as she crosses a road. This triggers nerve impulses and the release of adrenaline in her body.
Describe the role of the nerve impulses and adrenaline in helping her to react to this situation.
